perturbation.original_text: 1.1 iBio hereby grants to CC-Pharming for the term of this Agreement, a nonexclusive, non- assignable, non-sublicensable, limited right and license to use iBio's Technology in order to manufacture, process, prepare, and obtain regulatory approval for the development and production of Product(s) and work to be performed under this Agreement. Each Product will be set forth in a separate Statement of Work in the form set forth in Appendix A, which will be signed by representatives of each Party with signing authority.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.1 iBio hereby grants to CC-Pharming for the term of this Agreement, a nonexclusive, non- assignable, non-sublicensable, limited right and license to use iBio's Technology in order to manufacture, process, prepare, and obtain regulatory approval for the development and production of Product(s) and work to be performed under this Agreement. Each Pharmaceutical will be set forth in a separate Statement of Work in the form set forth in Appendix A, which will be signed by representatives of each Party with signing authority.
perturbation.explanation: The term "Product" is replaced with "Pharmaceutical". Later in the document, "Product" is used, creating confusion about whether both terms refer to the same thing or if they are distinct, leading to potential disputes over which term applies in specific scenarios.

perturbation.original_text: 2.1 Project Technical Coordinators will be appointed by each the Parties for each Statement of Work. The Project Technical Coordinators will be responsible for exchanging information with the other Party, coordinating any visits and arranging all other matters pertinent to that Statement of Work.
perturbation.changed_text: 2.1 Project Managers will be appointed by each the Parties for each Statement of Work. The Project Technical Coordinators will be responsible for exchanging information with the other Party, coordinating any visits and arranging all other matters pertinent to that Statement of Work.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Project Technical Coordinators' is replaced with 'Project Managers' in the first sentence, but the second sentence still refers to 'Project Technical Coordinators'. It is now unclear if Project Managers and Project Technical Coordinators are supposed to be the same role, leading to uncertainty on who should exchange information.

perturbation.original_text: 8.4 CC-Pharming represents and warranties that it shall maintain all of iBio's Technology and technical information, how-how, documents, materials, software, vectors, constructs, trade secrets, and other valuable business or scientific information strictly confidential at all times, and shall take all steps necessary to safe-guard iBio's Technology and technical information with reasonable business care and will be of the same types as currently practiced by iBio to maintain its highly confidential information.
perturbation.changed_text: 8.4 CC-Pharming represents and warranties that it shall maintain all of iBio's Intellectual Property and technical information, how-how, documents, materials, software, vectors, constructs, trade secrets, and other valuable business or scientific information strictly confidential at all times, and shall take all steps necessary to safe-guard iBio's Technology and technical information with reasonable business care and will be of the same types as currently practiced by iBio to maintain its highly confidential information.
perturbation.explanation: The term "iBio's Technology" is replaced with "iBio's Intellectual Property" in the first half of the sentence. The second half of the sentence still refers to "iBio's Technology". It is unclear if 'iBio's Technology' is now part of broader definition 'iBio's Intellectual Property', potentially changing the scope of the confidentiality obligations.
